outputs.output_descr: Complete phase-out of Chloro Flouro Carbons in the Foam Sector in India by end-2006, enable India to meet its obligations of phased Ozone Depleting Substance reductions in accordance with the control schedule of the Montreal Protocol and to ensure timely, sustainable and cost-effective Chloro Flouro Carbons phase-out in the Foam Sector through development and implementation of a combination of investment, technical support and management components.

Complete phase-out of Chloro Flouro Carbons in the Foam Sector in India by end-2006, enable India to meet its obligations of phased Ozone Depleting Substance reductions in accordance with the control schedule of the Montreal Protocol and to ensure timely, sustainable and cost-effective Chloro Flouro Carbons phase-out in the Foam Sector through development and implementation of a combination of investment, technical support and management components.

project_descr: Sectoral Phase-out Plan for Elimination of Chloro Fluoro Carbons  in the Foam Sector in India
project_title: Elimination of Chloro Fluoro Carbon in Foam Sector
